successes.title: Things-Could-Be-Worse Mugs
successes.description: No matter how bad your day is going, these beautiful porcelain Calamityware mugs graciously remind you things could be much worse.

Pledges.description: No reward. Perfect if you want to support this project but donâ€™t have room in your life for any mugs. Set your pledge level at any amount.
Set of four matching Things-Could-Be-Worse Mugs with multiple calamities to remind you that no matter how bad your day might be going, it could be far worse.
Two sets of four (8) matching Things-Could-Be-Worse Mugs with multiple calamities to remind you that no matter how bad your day might be going, it could be far worse.
Three sets of four (12) matching Things-Could-Be-Worse Mugs with multiple calamities to remind you that no matter how bad your day might be going, it could be far worse.
